name: Nier: OopsMata
description:
Nier : OopsMata

A fan made game inspired by a game called Nier : Automata.

Created from scratch in 2 months, with over 50+ level to complete.

Controls:
  • Move : W-A-S-D.
  • Rotate : Arrow keys.
  • Shoot : Shift.
GameLenghts:
  • Expected about 10-30 minutes of gameplay depends how good you're.
Additional information:
  • Background music used in game is come from the actual game Nier:Automata.
